2312 
2313 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2314 /* Load a sector and check if it is an FAT boot sector */
2315 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2316 
2317 MEMSPACE
2318 static
2319 BYTE check_fs ( /* 0:FAT boor sector, 1:Valid boor sector but not FAT, 2:Not a boot sector, 3:Disk error */
2320 FATFS* fs, /* File system object */
2321 DWORD sect /* Sector# (lba) to check if it is an FAT boot record or not */
2322 )
2323 {
2324  fs->wflag = 0; fs->winsect = 0xFFFFFFFF; /* Invaidate window */
2325  if (move_window(fs, sect) != FR_OK) /* Load boot record */
2326  return 3;
2327 
2328  if (LD_WORD(&fs->win[BS_55AA]) != 0xAA55) /* Check boot record signature (always placed at offset 510 even if the sector size is >512) */
2329  return 2;
2330 
2331 /* Check "FAT" string */
2332  if ((LD_DWORD(&fs->win[BS_FilSysType]) & 0xFFFFFF) == 0x544146)
2333  return 0;
2334 /* Check "FAT" string */
2335  if ((LD_DWORD(&fs->win[BS_FilSysType32]) & 0xFFFFFF) == 0x544146)
2336  return 0;
2337 
2338  return 1;
2339 }
2340 
2341 
2342 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2343 /* Find logical drive and check if the volume is mounted */
2344 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2345 
2346 MEMSPACE
2347 static
2348 FRESULT find_volume ( /* FR_OK(0): successful, !=0: any error occurred */
2349 FATFS** rfs, /* Pointer to pointer to the found file system object */
2350 const TCHAR** path, /* Pointer to pointer to the path name (drive number) */
2351 BYTE wmode /* !=0: Check write protection for write access */
2352 )
2353 {
2354  BYTE fmt;
2355  int vol;
2356  DSTATUS stat;
2357  DWORD bsect, fasize, tsect, sysect, nclst, szbfat;
2358  WORD nrsv;
2359  FATFS *fs;
2360 
2361 /* Get logical drive number from the path name */
2362  *rfs = 0;
2363  vol = get_ldnumber(path);
2364  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
2365 
2366 /* Check if the file system object is valid or not */
2367  fs = FatFs[vol]; /* Get pointer to the file system object */
2368  if (!fs) return FR_NOT_ENABLED; /* Is the file system object available? */
2369 
2370  ENTER_FF(fs); /* Lock the volume */
2371  *rfs = fs; /* Return pointer to the file system object */
2372 
2373  if (fs->fs_type) /* If the volume has been mounted */
2374  {
2375  stat = disk_status(fs->drv);
2376  if (!(stat & STA_NOINIT)) /* and the physical drive is kept initialized */
2377  {
2378 /* Check write protection if needed */
2379  if (!_FS_READONLY && wmode && (stat & STA_PROTECT))
2380  return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
2381  return FR_OK; /* The file system object is valid */
2382  }
2383  }
2384 
2385 /* The file system object is not valid. */
2386 /* Following code attempts to mount the volume. (analyze BPB and initialize the fs object) */
2387 
2388  fs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear the file system object */
2389  fs->drv = LD2PD(vol); /* Bind the logical drive and a physical drive */
2390  stat = disk_initialize(fs->drv); /* Initialize the physical drive */
2391  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) /* Check if the initialization succeeded */
2392  return FR_NOT_READY; /* Failed to initialize due to no medium or hard error */
2393 /* Check disk write protection if needed */
2394  if (!_FS_READONLY && wmode && (stat & STA_PROTECT))
2395  return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
2396 #if _MAX_SS != _MIN_SS /* Get sector size (multiple sector size cfg only) */
2397  if (disk_ioctl(fs->drv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &SS(fs)) != RES_OK
2398  || SS(fs) < _MIN_SS || SS(fs) > _MAX_SS) return FR_DISK_ERR;
2399 #endif
2400 /* Find an FAT partition on the drive. Supports only generic partitioning, FDISK and SFD. */
2401  bsect = 0;
2402  fmt = check_fs(fs, bsect); /* Load sector 0 and check if it is an FAT boot sector as SFD */
2403  if (fmt == 1 || (!fmt && (LD2PT(vol)))) /* Not an FAT boot sector or forced partition number */
2404  {
2405  UINT i;
2406  DWORD br[4];
2407 
2408  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) /* Get partition offset */
2409  {
2410  BYTE *pt = fs->win+MBR_Table + i * SZ_PTE;
2411  br[i] = pt[4] ? LD_DWORD(&pt[8]) : 0;
2412  }
2413  i = LD2PT(vol); /* Partition number: 0:auto, 1-4:forced */
2414  if (i) i--;
2415  do /* Find an FAT volume */
2416  {
2417  bsect = br[i];
2418  fmt = bsect ? check_fs(fs, bsect) : 2;/* Check the partition */
2419  } while (!LD2PT(vol) && fmt && ++i < 4);
2420  }
2421  if (fmt == 3) return FR_DISK_ERR; /* An error occured in the disk I/O layer */
2422  if (fmt) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* No FAT volume is found */
2423 
2424 /* An FAT volume is found. Following code initializes the file system object */
2425 
2426  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_BytsPerSec) != SS(fs))/* (BPB_BytsPerSec must be equal to the physical sector size) */
2427  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2428 
2429  fasize = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_FATSz16); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
2430  if (!fasize) fasize = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_FATSz32);
2431  fs->fsize = fasize;
2432 
2433  fs->n_fats = fs->win[BPB_NumFATs]; /* Number of FAT copies */
2434  if (fs->n_fats != 1 && fs->n_fats != 2) /* (Must be 1 or 2) */
2435  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2436  fasize *= fs->n_fats; /* Number of sectors for FAT area */
2437 
2438  fs->csize = fs->win[BPB_SecPerClus]; /* Number of sectors per cluster */
2439 /* (Must be power of 2) */
2440  if (!fs->csize || (fs->csize & (fs->csize - 1)))
2441  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2442 
2443 /* Number of root directory entries */
2444  fs->n_rootdir = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_RootEntCnt);
2445  if (fs->n_rootdir % (SS(fs) / SZ_DIR)) /* (Must be sector aligned) */
2446  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2447 
2448  tsect = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_TotSec16); /* Number of sectors on the volume */
2449  if (!tsect) tsect = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_TotSec32);
2450 
2451  nrsv = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_RsvdSecCnt); /* Number of reserved sectors */
2452  if (!nrsv) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Must not be 0) */
2453 
2454 /* Determine the FAT sub type */
2455 /* RSV+FAT+DIR */
2456  sysect = nrsv + fasize + fs->n_rootdir / (SS(fs) / SZ_DIR);
2457  if (tsect < sysect) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Invalid volume size) */
2458  nclst = (tsect - sysect) / fs->csize; /* Number of clusters */
2459  if (!nclst) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Invalid volume size) */
2460  fmt = FS_FAT12;
2461  if (nclst >= MIN_FAT16) fmt = FS_FAT16;
2462  if (nclst >= MIN_FAT32) fmt = FS_FAT32;
2463 
2464 /* Boundaries and Limits */
2465  fs->n_fatent = nclst + 2; /* Number of FAT entries */
2466  fs->volbase = bsect; /* Volume start sector */
2467  fs->fatbase = bsect + nrsv; /* FAT start sector */
2468  fs->database = bsect + sysect; /* Data start sector */
2469  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
2470  {
2471 /* (BPB_RootEntCnt must be 0) */
2472  if (fs->n_rootdir) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2473 /* Root directory start cluster */
2474  fs->dirbase = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_RootClus);
2475  szbfat = fs->n_fatent * 4; /* (Needed FAT size) */
2476  }
2477  else
2478  {
2479 /* (BPB_RootEntCnt must not be 0) */
2480  if (!fs->n_rootdir) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2481  fs->dirbase = fs->fatbase + fasize; /* Root directory start sector */
2482  szbfat = (fmt == FS_FAT16) ? /* (Needed FAT size) */
2483  fs->n_fatent * 2 : fs->n_fatent * 3 / 2 + (fs->n_fatent & 1);
2484  }
2485 /* (BPB_FATSz must not be less than needed) */
2486  if (fs->fsize < (szbfat + (SS(fs) - 1)) / SS(fs))
2487  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2488 
2489 #if !_FS_READONLY
2490 /* Initialize cluster allocation information */
2491  fs->last_clust = fs->free_clust = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2492 
2493 /* Get fsinfo if available */
2494  fs->fsi_flag = 0x80;
2495 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 3) != 3
2496  if (fmt == FS_FAT32 /* Enable FSINFO only if FAT32 and BPB_FSInfo is 1 */
2497  && LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_FSInfo) == 1
2498  && move_window(fs, bsect + 1) == FR_OK)
2499  {
2500  fs->fsi_flag = 0;
2501  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA) == 0xAA55 /* Load FSINFO data if available */
2502  && LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_LeadSig) == 0x41615252
2503  && LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_StrucSig) == 0x61417272)
2504  {
2505 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 1) == 0
2506  fs->free_clust = LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_Free_Count);
2507 #endif
2508 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 2) == 0
2509  fs->last_clust = LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_Nxt_Free);
2510 #endif
2511  }
2512  }
2513 #endif
2514 #endif
2515  fs->fs_type = fmt; /* FAT sub-type */
2516  fs->id = ++Fsid; /* File system mount ID */
2517 #if _FS_RPATH
2518  fs->cdir = 0; /* Set current directory to root */
2519 #endif
2520 #if _FS_LOCK /* Clear file lock semaphores */
2521  clear_lock(fs);
2522 #endif
2523 
2524  return FR_OK;
2525 }
2526 
2527 
2528 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2529 /* Check if the file/directory object is valid or not */
2530 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2531 
2532 MEMSPACE
2533 static
2534 FRESULT validate ( /* FR_OK(0): The object is valid, !=0: Invalid */
2535 void* obj /* Pointer to the object FIL/DIR to check validity */
2536 )
2537 {
2538  FIL *fil = (FIL*)obj; /* Assuming offset of .fs and .id in the FIL/DIR structure is identical */
2539 
2540  if (!fil || !fil->fs || !fil->fs->fs_type || fil->fs->id != fil->id)
2541  return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
2542 
2543  ENTER_FF(fil->fs); /* Lock file system */
2544 
2545  if (disk_status(fil->fs->drv) & STA_NOINIT)
2546  return FR_NOT_READY;
2547 
2548  return FR_OK;
2549 }
2550 
2551 
2552 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2553 
2554  Public Functions
2555 
2556 --------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2557 
2558 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2559 /* Mount/Unmount a Logical Drive */
2560 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2561 
2562 MEMSPACE
2563 FRESULT f_mount (
2564 FATFS* fs, /* Pointer to the file system object (NULL:unmount)*/
2565 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number to be mounted/unmounted */
2566 BYTE opt /* 0:Do not mount (delayed mount), 1:Mount immediately */
2567 )
2568 {
2569  FATFS *cfs;
2570  int vol;
2571  FRESULT res;
2572  const TCHAR *rp = path;
2573 
2574  vol = get_ldnumber(&rp);
2575  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
2576  cfs = FatFs[vol]; /* Pointer to fs object */
2577 
2578  if (cfs)
2579  {
2580 #if _FS_LOCK
2581  clear_lock(cfs);
2582 #endif
2583 #if _FS_REENTRANT /* Discard sync object of the current volume */
2584  if (!ff_del_syncobj(cfs->sobj)) return FR_INT_ERR;
2585 #endif
2586  cfs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear old fs object */
2587  }
2588 
2589  if (fs)
2590  {
2591  fs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear new fs object */
2592 #if _FS_REENTRANT /* Create sync object for the new volume */
2593  if (!ff_cre_syncobj((BYTE)vol, &fs->sobj)) return FR_INT_ERR;
2594 #endif
2595  }
2596  FatFs[vol] = fs; /* Register new fs object */
2597 
2598  if (!fs || opt != 1) return FR_OK; /* Do not mount now, it will be mounted later */
2599 
2600  res = find_volume(&fs, &path, 0); /* Force mounted the volume */
2601  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
2602 }
2603 
2604 
2605 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2606 /* Open or Create a File */
2607 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2608 
2609 MEMSPACE
2610 FRESULT f_open (
2611 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the blank file object */
2612 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file name */
2613 BYTE mode /* Access mode and file open mode flags */
2614 )
2615 {
2616  FRESULT res;
2617  DIR dj;
2618  BYTE *dir;
2619  DEF_NAMEBUF;
2620 
2621  if (!fp) return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
2622  fp->fs = 0; /* Clear file object */
2623 
2624 /* Get logical drive number */
2625 #if !_FS_READONLY
2626  mode &= FA_READ | FA_WRITE | FA_CREATE_ALWAYS | FA_OPEN_ALWAYS | FA_CREATE_NEW;
2627  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, (BYTE)(mode & ~FA_READ));
2628 #else
2629  mode &= FA_READ;
2630  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
2631 #endif
2632  if (res == FR_OK)
2633  {
2634  INIT_BUF(dj);
2635  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
2636  dir = dj.dir;
2637 #if !_FS_READONLY /* R/W configuration */
2638  if (res == FR_OK)
2639  {
2640  if (!dir) /* Default directory itself */
2641  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
2642 #if _FS_LOCK
2643  else
2644  res = chk_lock(&dj, (mode & ~FA_READ) ? 1 : 0);
2645 #endif
2646  }
2647 /* Create or Open a file */
2648  if (mode & (FA_CREATE_ALWAYS | FA_OPEN_ALWAYS | FA_CREATE_NEW))
2649  {
2650  DWORD dw, cl;
2651 
2652  if (res != FR_OK) /* No file, create new */
2653  {
2654  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* There is no file to open, create a new entry */
2655 #if _FS_LOCK
2656  res = enq_lock() ? dir_register(&dj) : FR_TOO_MANY_OPEN_FILES;
2657 #else
2658  res = dir_register(&dj);
2659 #endif
2660  mode |= FA_CREATE_ALWAYS; /* File is created */
2661  dir = dj.dir; /* New entry */
2662  }
2663  else /* Any object is already existing */
2664  {
2665 /* Cannot overwrite it (R/O or DIR) */
2666  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & (AM_RDO | AM_DIR))
2667  {
2668  res = FR_DENIED;
2669  }
2670  else
2671  {
2672  if (mode & FA_CREATE_NEW) /* Cannot create as new file */
2673  res = FR_EXIST;
2674  }
2675  }
2676 /* Truncate it if overwrite mode */
2677  if (res == FR_OK && (mode & FA_CREATE_ALWAYS))
2678  {
2679  dw = get_fattime(); /* Created time */
2680  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_CrtTime, dw);
2681  dir[DIR_Attr] = 0; /* Reset attribute */
2682  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize, 0); /* size = 0 */
2683  cl = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir); /* Get start cluster */
2684  st_clust(dir, 0); /* cluster = 0 */
2685  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
2686  if (cl) /* Remove the cluster chain if exist */
2687  {
2688  dw = dj.fs->winsect;
2689  res = remove_chain(dj.fs, cl);
2690  if (res == FR_OK)
2691  {
2692 /* Reuse the cluster hole */
2693  dj.fs->last_clust = cl - 1;
2694  res = move_window(dj.fs, dw);
2695  }
2696  }
2697  }
2698  }
2699  else /* Open an existing file */
2700  {
2701  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow succeeded */
2702  {
2703  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* It is a directory */
2704  {
2705  res = FR_NO_FILE;
2706  }
2707  else
2708  {
2709 /* R/O violation */
2710  if ((mode & FA_WRITE) && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_RDO))
2711  res = FR_DENIED;
2712  }
2713  }
2714  }
2715  if (res == FR_OK)
2716  {
2717  if (mode & FA_CREATE_ALWAYS) /* Set file change flag if created or overwritten */
2718  mode |= FA__WRITTEN;
2719  fp->dir_sect = dj.fs->winsect; /* Pointer to the directory entry */
2720  fp->dir_ptr = dir;
2721 #if _FS_LOCK
2722  fp->lockid = inc_lock(&dj, (mode & ~FA_READ) ? 1 : 0);
2723  if (!fp->lockid) res = FR_INT_ERR;
2724 #endif
2725  }
2726 
2727 #else /* R/O configuration */
2728  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow succeeded */
2729  {
2730  dir = dj.dir;
2731  if (!dir) /* Current directory itself */
2732  {
2733  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
2734  }
2735  else
2736  {
2737  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* It is a directory */
2738  res = FR_NO_FILE;
2739  }
2740  }
2741 #endif
2742  FREE_BUF();
2743 
2744  if (res == FR_OK)
2745  {
2746  fp->flag = mode; /* File access mode */
2747  fp->err = 0; /* Clear error flag */
2748  fp->sclust = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir); /* File start cluster */
2749 /* File size */
2750  fp->fsize = LD_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize);
2751  fp->fptr = 0; /* File pointer */
2752  fp->dsect = 0;
2753 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2754  fp->cltbl = 0; /* Normal seek mode */
2755 #endif
2756  fp->fs = dj.fs; /* Validate file object */
2757  fp->id = fp->fs->id;
2758  }
2759  }
2760 
2761  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
2762 }
2763 
2764 
2765 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2766 /* Read File */
2767 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2768 
2769 MEMSPACE
2770 FRESULT f_read (
2771 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
2772 void* buff, /* Pointer to data buffer */
2773 UINT btr, /* Number of bytes to read */
2774 UINT* br /* Pointer to number of bytes read */
2775 )
2776 {
2777  FRESULT res;
2778  DWORD clst, sect, remain;
2779  UINT rcnt, cc;
2780  BYTE csect, *rbuff = (BYTE*)buff;
2781 
2782  *br = 0; /* Clear read byte counter */
2783 
2784  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity */
2785  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
2786  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
2787  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
2788  if (!(fp->flag & FA_READ)) /* Check access mode */
2789  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
2790  remain = fp->fsize - fp->fptr;
2791  if (btr > remain) btr = (UINT)remain; /* Truncate btr by remaining bytes */
2792 
2793  for ( ; btr; /* Repeat until all data read */
2794  rbuff += rcnt, fp->fptr += rcnt, *br += rcnt, btr -= rcnt)
2795  {
2796  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
2797  {
2798 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
2799  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
2800  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
2801  {
2802  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* On the top of the file? */
2803  {
2804  clst = fp->sclust; /* Follow from the origin */
2805  } /* Middle or end of the file */
2806  else
2807  {
2808 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2809  if (fp->cltbl)
2810 /* Get cluster# from the CLMT */
2811  clst = clmt_clust(fp, fp->fptr);
2812  else
2813 #endif
2814 /* Follow cluster chain on the FAT */
2815  clst = get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
2816  }
2817  if (clst < 2) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2818  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2819  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
2820  }
2821  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current sector */
2822  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2823  sect += csect;
2824  cc = btr / SS(fp->fs); /* When remaining bytes >= sector size, */
2825  if (cc) /* Read maximum contiguous sectors directly */
2826  {
2827  if (csect + cc > fp->fs->csize) /* Clip at cluster boundary */
2828  cc = fp->fs->csize - csect;
2829  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, rbuff, sect, cc))
2830  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2831 /* Replace one of the read sectors with cached data if it contains a dirty sector */
2832 #if !_FS_READONLY && _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
2833 #if _FS_TINY
2834  if (fp->fs->wflag && fp->fs->winsect - sect < cc)
2835  mem_cpy(rbuff + ((fp->fs->winsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), fp->fs->win, SS(fp->fs));
2836 #else
2837  if ((fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) && fp->dsect - sect < cc)
2838  mem_cpy(rbuff + ((fp->dsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), fp->buf, SS(fp->fs));
2839 #endif
2840 #endif
2841  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) * cc; /* Number of bytes transferred */
2842  continue;
2843  }
2844 #if !_FS_TINY
2845  if (fp->dsect != sect) /* Load data sector if not in cache */
2846  {
2847 #if !_FS_READONLY
2848  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
2849  {
2850  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
2851  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2852  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2853  }
2854 #endif
2855 /* Fill sector cache */
2856  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, sect, 1))
2857  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2858  }
2859 #endif
2860  fp->dsect = sect;
2861  }
2862 /* Get partial sector data from sector buffer */
2863  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) - ((UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
2864  if (rcnt > btr) rcnt = btr;
2865 #if _FS_TINY
2866  if (move_window(fp->fs, fp->dsect)) /* Move sector window */
2867  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2868 /* Pick partial sector */
2869  mem_cpy(rbuff, &fp->fs->win[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
2870 #else
2871 /* Pick partial sector */
2872  mem_cpy(rbuff, &fp->buf[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
2873 #endif
2874  }
2875 
2876  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
2877 }
2878 
2879 
2880 #if !_FS_READONLY
2881 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2882 /* Write File */
2883 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2884 
2885 MEMSPACE
2886 FRESULT f_write (
2887 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
2888 const void *buff, /* Pointer to the data to be written */
2889 UINT btw, /* Number of bytes to write */
2890 UINT* bw /* Pointer to number of bytes written */
2891 )
2892 {
2893  FRESULT res;
2894  DWORD clst, sect;
2895  UINT wcnt, cc;
2896  const BYTE *wbuff = (const BYTE*)buff;
2897  BYTE csect;
2898 
2899  *bw = 0; /* Clear write byte counter */
2900 
2901  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity */
2902  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
2903  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
2904  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
2905  if (!(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)) /* Check access mode */
2906  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
2907  if (fp->fptr + btw < fp->fptr) btw = 0; /* File size cannot reach 4GB */
2908 
2909  for ( ; btw; /* Repeat until all data written */
2910  wbuff += wcnt, fp->fptr += wcnt, *bw += wcnt, btw -= wcnt)
2911  {
2912  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
2913  {
2914 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
2915  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
2916  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
2917  {
2918  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* On the top of the file? */
2919  {
2920  clst = fp->sclust; /* Follow from the origin */
2921  if (clst == 0) /* When no cluster is allocated, */
2922 /* Create a new cluster chain */
2923  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, 0);
2924  } /* Middle or end of the file */
2925  else
2926  {
2927 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2928  if (fp->cltbl)
2929 /* Get cluster# from the CLMT */
2930  clst = clmt_clust(fp, fp->fptr);
2931  else
2932 #endif
2933 /* Follow or stretch cluster chain on the FAT */
2934  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, fp->clust);
2935  }
2936  if (clst == 0) break; /* Could not allocate a new cluster (disk full) */
2937  if (clst == 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2938  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2939  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
2940 /* Set start cluster if the first write */
2941  if (fp->sclust == 0) fp->sclust = clst;
2942  }
2943 #if _FS_TINY
2944 /* Write-back sector cache */
2945  if (fp->fs->winsect == fp->dsect && sync_window(fp->fs))
2946  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2947 #else
2948  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back sector cache */
2949  {
2950  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
2951  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2952  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2953  }
2954 #endif
2955  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current sector */
2956  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2957  sect += csect;
2958  cc = btw / SS(fp->fs); /* When remaining bytes >= sector size, */
2959  if (cc) /* Write maximum contiguous sectors directly */
2960  {
2961  if (csect + cc > fp->fs->csize) /* Clip at cluster boundary */
2962  cc = fp->fs->csize - csect;
2963  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, wbuff, sect, cc))
2964  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2965 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
2966 #if _FS_TINY
2967  if (fp->fs->winsect - sect < cc) /* Refill sector cache if it gets invalidated by the direct write */
2968  {
2969  mem_cpy(fp->fs->win, wbuff + ((fp->fs->winsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), SS(fp->fs));
2970  fp->fs->wflag = 0;
2971  }
2972 #else
2973  if (fp->dsect - sect < cc) /* Refill sector cache if it gets invalidated by the direct write */
2974  {
2975  mem_cpy(fp->buf, wbuff + ((fp->dsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), SS(fp->fs));
2976  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2977  }
2978 #endif
2979 #endif
2980  wcnt = SS(fp->fs) * cc; /* Number of bytes transferred */
2981  continue;
2982  }
2983 #if _FS_TINY
2984  if (fp->fptr >= fp->fsize) /* Avoid silly cache filling at growing edge */
2985  {
2986  if (sync_window(fp->fs)) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2987  fp->fs->winsect = sect;
2988  }
2989 #else
2990  if (fp->dsect != sect) /* Fill sector cache with file data */
2991  {
2992  if (fp->fptr < fp->fsize &&
2993  disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, sect, 1))
2994  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2995  }
2996 #endif
2997  fp->dsect = sect;
2998  }
2999 /* Put partial sector into file I/O buffer */
3000  wcnt = SS(fp->fs) - ((UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
3001  if (wcnt > btw) wcnt = btw;
3002 #if _FS_TINY
3003  if (move_window(fp->fs, fp->dsect)) /* Move sector window */
3004  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3005 /* Fit partial sector */
3006  mem_cpy(&fp->fs->win[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], wbuff, wcnt);
3007  fp->fs->wflag = 1;
3008 #else
3009 /* Fit partial sector */
3010  mem_cpy(&fp->buf[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], wbuff, wcnt);
3011  fp->flag |= FA__DIRTY;
3012 #endif
3013  }
3014 
3015 /* Update file size if needed */
3016  if (fp->fptr > fp->fsize) fp->fsize = fp->fptr;
3017  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN; /* Set file change flag */
3018 
3019  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
3020 }
3021 
3022 
3023 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3024 /* Synchronize the File */
3025 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3026 
3027 MEMSPACE
3028 FRESULT f_sync (
3029 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
3030 )
3031 {
3032  FRESULT res;
3033  DWORD tm;
3034  BYTE *dir;
3035 
3036  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3037  if (res == FR_OK)
3038  {
3039  if (fp->flag & FA__WRITTEN) /* Has the file been written? */
3040  {
3041 /* Write-back dirty buffer */
3042 #if !_FS_TINY
3043  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY)
3044  {
3045  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3046  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3047  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3048  }
3049 #endif
3050 /* Update the directory entry */
3051  res = move_window(fp->fs, fp->dir_sect);
3052  if (res == FR_OK)
3053  {
3054  dir = fp->dir_ptr;
3055  dir[DIR_Attr] |= AM_ARC; /* Set archive bit */
3056 /* Update file size */
3057  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize, fp->fsize);
3058  st_clust(dir, fp->sclust); /* Update start cluster */
3059  tm = get_fattime(); /* Update updated time */
3060  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
3061  ST_WORD(dir+DIR_LstAccDate, 0);
3062  fp->flag &= ~FA__WRITTEN;
3063  fp->fs->wflag = 1;
3064  res = sync_fs(fp->fs);
3065  }
3066  }
3067  }
3068 
3069  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3070 }
3071 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
3072 
3073 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3074 /* Close File */
3075 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3076 
3077 MEMSPACE
3078 FRESULT f_close (
3079 FIL *fp /* Pointer to the file object to be closed */
3080 )
3081 {
3082  FRESULT res;
3083 
3084 #if !_FS_READONLY
3085  res = f_sync(fp); /* Flush cached data */
3086  if (res == FR_OK)
3087 #endif
3088  {
3089  res = validate(fp); /* Lock volume */
3090  if (res == FR_OK)
3091  {
3092 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3093  FATFS *fs = fp->fs;
3094 #endif
3095 #if _FS_LOCK
3096  res = dec_lock(fp->lockid); /* Decrement file open counter */
3097  if (res == FR_OK)
3098 #endif
3099  fp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate file object */
3100 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3101  unlock_fs(fs, FR_OK); /* Unlock volume */
3102 #endif
3103  }
3104  }
3105  return res;
3106 }

3113 #if _FS_RPATH >= 1
3114 #if _VOLUMES >= 2
3115 MEMSPACE
3116 FRESULT f_chdrive (
3117 const TCHAR* path /* Drive number */
3118 )
3119 {
3120  int vol;
3121 
3122  vol = get_ldnumber(&path);
3123  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
3124 
3125  CurrVol = (BYTE)vol;
3126 
3127  return FR_OK;

3129 #endif

3131 MEMSPACE
3132 FRESULT f_chdir (
3133 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3134 )
3135 {
3136  FRESULT res;
3137  DIR dj;
3138  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3139 
3140 /* Get logical drive number */
3141  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
3142  if (res == FR_OK)
3143  {
3144  INIT_BUF(dj);
3145  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the path */
3146  FREE_BUF();
3147  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3148  {
3149  if (!dj.dir)
3150  {
3151  dj.fs->cdir = dj.sclust; /* Start directory itself */
3152  }
3153  else
3154  {
3155  if (dj.dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* Reached to the directory */
3156  dj.fs->cdir = ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir);
3157  else
3158  res = FR_NO_PATH; /* Reached but a file */
3159  }
3160  }
3161  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_NO_PATH;
3162  }
3163 
3164  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3165 }

3167 
3168 #if _FS_RPATH >= 2
3169 MEMSPACE
3170 FRESULT f_getcwd (
3171 TCHAR* buff, /* Pointer to the directory path */
3172 UINT len /* Size of path */
3173 )
3174 {
3175  FRESULT res;
3176  DIR dj;
3177  UINT i, n;
3178  DWORD ccl;
3179  TCHAR *tp;
3180  FILINFO fno;
3181  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3182 
3183  *buff = 0;
3184 /* Get logical drive number */
3185 /* Get current volume */
3186  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, (const TCHAR**)&buff, 0);
3187  if (res == FR_OK)
3188  {
3189  INIT_BUF(dj);
3190  i = len; /* Bottom of buffer (directory stack base) */
3191  dj.sclust = dj.fs->cdir; /* Start to follow upper directory from current directory */
3192  while ((ccl = dj.sclust) != 0) /* Repeat while current directory is a sub-directory */
3193  {
3194  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 1); /* Get parent directory */
3195  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3196  res = dir_read(&dj, 0);
3197  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3198  dj.sclust = ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir); /* Goto parent directory */
3199  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
3200  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3201  do /* Find the entry links to the child directory */
3202  {
3203  res = dir_read(&dj, 0);
3204  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3205 /* Found the entry */
3206  if (ccl == ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir)) break;
3207  res = dir_next(&dj, 0);
3208  } while (res == FR_OK);
3209 /* It cannot be 'not found'. */
3210  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3211  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3212 #if _USE_LFN
3213  fno.lfname = buff;
3214  fno.lfsize = i;
3215 #endif
3216  get_fileinfo(&dj, &fno); /* Get the directory name and push it to the buffer */
3217  tp = fno.fname;
3218 #if _USE_LFN
3219  if (*buff) tp = buff;
3220 #endif
3221  for (n = 0; tp[n]; n++) ;
3222  if (i < n + 3)
3223  {
3224  res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE; break;
3225  }
3226  while (n) buff[--i] = tp[--n];
3227  buff[--i] = '/';
3228  }
3229  tp = buff;
3230  if (res == FR_OK)
3231  {
3232 #if _VOLUMES >= 2
3233  *tp++ = '0' + CurrVol; /* Put drive number */
3234  *tp++ = ':';
3235 #endif
3236  if (i == len) /* Root-directory */
3237  {
3238  *tp++ = '/';
3239  } /* Sub-directroy */
3240  else
3241  {
3242  do /* Add stacked path str */
3243  *tp++ = buff[i++];
3244  while (i < len);
3245  }
3246  }
3247  *tp = 0;
3248  FREE_BUF();
3249  }
3250 
3251  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3252 }
3253 #endif /* _FS_RPATH >= 2 */
3254 #endif /* _FS_RPATH >= 1 */
3255 
3256 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
3257 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3258 /* Seek File R/W Pointer */
3259 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3260 
3261 MEMSPACE
3262 FRESULT f_lseek (
3263 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
3264 DWORD ofs /* File pointer from top of file */
3265 )
3266 {
3267  FRESULT res;
3268 
3269  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3270  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3271  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
3272  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
3273 
3274 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
3275  if (fp->cltbl) /* Fast seek */
3276  {
3277  DWORD cl, pcl, ncl, tcl, dsc, tlen, ulen, *tbl;
3278 
3279  if (ofs == CREATE_LINKMAP) /* Create CLMT */
3280  {
3281  tbl = fp->cltbl;
3282  tlen = *tbl++; ulen = 2; /* Given table size and required table size */
3283  cl = fp->sclust; /* Top of the chain */
3284  if (cl)
3285  {
3286  do
3287  {
3288 /* Get a fragment */
3289  tcl = cl; ncl = 0; ulen += 2; /* Top, length and used items */
3290  do
3291  {
3292  pcl = cl; ncl++;
3293  cl = get_fat(fp->fs, cl);
3294  if (cl <= 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3295  if (cl == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3296  } while (cl == pcl + 1);
3297  if (ulen <= tlen) /* Store the length and top of the fragment */
3298  {
3299  *tbl++ = ncl; *tbl++ = tcl;
3300  }
3301 /* Repeat until end of chain */
3302  } while (cl < fp->fs->n_fatent);
3303  }
3304  *fp->cltbl = ulen; /* Number of items used */
3305  if (ulen <= tlen)
3306  *tbl = 0; /* Terminate table */
3307  else
3308  res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE; /* Given table size is smaller than required */
3309 
3310  } /* Fast seek */
3311  else
3312  {
3313  if (ofs > fp->fsize) /* Clip offset at the file size */
3314  ofs = fp->fsize;
3315  fp->fptr = ofs; /* Set file pointer */
3316  if (ofs)
3317  {
3318  fp->clust = clmt_clust(fp, ofs - 1);
3319  dsc = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust);
3320  if (!dsc) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3321  dsc += (ofs - 1) / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1);
3322 /* Refill sector cache if needed */
3323  if (fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs) && dsc != fp->dsect)
3324  {
3325 #if !_FS_TINY
3326 #if !_FS_READONLY
3327  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
3328  {
3329  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3330  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3331  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3332  }
3333 #endif
3334 /* Load current sector */
3335  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, dsc, 1))
3336  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3337 #endif
3338  fp->dsect = dsc;
3339  }
3340  }
3341  }
3342  } else
3343 #endif
3344 
3345 /* Normal Seek */
3346  {
3347  DWORD clst, bcs, nsect, ifptr;
3348 
3349  if (ofs > fp->fsize /* In read-only mode, clip offset with the file size */
3350  #if !_FS_READONLY
3351  && !(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)
3352  #endif
3353  ) ofs = fp->fsize;
3354 
3355  ifptr = fp->fptr;
3356  fp->fptr = nsect = 0;
3357  if (ofs)
3358  {
3359 /* Cluster size (byte) */
3360  bcs = (DWORD)fp->fs->csize * SS(fp->fs);
3361  if (ifptr > 0 &&
3362 /* When seek to same or following cluster, */
3363  (ofs - 1) / bcs >= (ifptr - 1) / bcs)
3364  {
3365 /* start from the current cluster */
3366  fp->fptr = (ifptr - 1) & ~(bcs - 1);
3367  ofs -= fp->fptr;
3368  clst = fp->clust;
3369  } /* When seek to back cluster, */
3370  else
3371  {
3372  clst = fp->sclust; /* start from the first cluster */
3373 #if !_FS_READONLY
3374  if (clst == 0) /* If no cluster chain, create a new chain */
3375  {
3376  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, 0);
3377  if (clst == 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3378  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3379  fp->sclust = clst;
3380  }
3381 #endif
3382  fp->clust = clst;
3383  }
3384  if (clst != 0)
3385  {
3386  while (ofs > bcs) /* Cluster following loop */
3387  {
3388 #if !_FS_READONLY
3389  if (fp->flag & FA_WRITE) /* Check if in write mode or not */
3390  {
3391 /* Force stretch if in write mode */
3392  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, clst);
3393  if (clst == 0) /* When disk gets full, clip file size */
3394  {
3395  ofs = bcs; break;
3396  }
3397  } else
3398 #endif
3399  clst = get_fat(fp->fs, clst); /* Follow cluster chain if not in write mode */
3400  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3401  if (clst <= 1 || clst >= fp->fs->n_fatent) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3402  fp->clust = clst;
3403  fp->fptr += bcs;
3404  ofs -= bcs;
3405  }
3406  fp->fptr += ofs;
3407  if (ofs % SS(fp->fs))
3408  {
3409 /* Current sector */
3410  nsect = clust2sect(fp->fs, clst);
3411  if (!nsect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3412  nsect += ofs / SS(fp->fs);
3413  }
3414  }
3415  }
3416 /* Fill sector cache if needed */
3417  if (fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs) && nsect != fp->dsect)
3418  {
3419 #if !_FS_TINY
3420 #if !_FS_READONLY
3421  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
3422  {
3423  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3424  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3425  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3426  }
3427 #endif
3428 /* Fill sector cache */
3429  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, nsect, 1))
3430  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3431 #endif
3432  fp->dsect = nsect;
3433  }
3434 #if !_FS_READONLY
3435  if (fp->fptr > fp->fsize) /* Set file change flag if the file size is extended */
3436  {
3437  fp->fsize = fp->fptr;
3438  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN;
3439  }
3440 #endif
3441  }
3442 
3443  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3444 }
3445 
3446 
3447 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 1
3448 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3449 /* Create a Directory Object */
3450 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3451 
3452 MEMSPACE
3453 FRESULT f_opendir (
3454 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to directory object to create */
3455 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3456 )
3457 {
3458  FRESULT res;
3459  FATFS* fs;
3460  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3461 
3462  if (!dp) return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
3463 
3464 /* Get logical drive number */
3465  res = find_volume(&fs, &path, 0);
3466  if (res == FR_OK)
3467  {
3468  dp->fs = fs;
3469  INIT_BUF(*dp);
3470  res = follow_path(dp, path); /* Follow the path to the directory */
3471  FREE_BUF();
3472  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3473  {
3474  if (dp->dir) /* It is not the origin directory itself */
3475  {
3476  if (dp->dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* The object is a sub directory */
3477  dp->sclust = ld_clust(fs, dp->dir);
3478  else /* The object is a file */
3479  res = FR_NO_PATH;
3480  }
3481  if (res == FR_OK)
3482  {
3483  dp->id = fs->id;
3484  res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind directory */
3485 #if _FS_LOCK
3486  if (res == FR_OK)
3487  {
3488  if (dp->sclust)
3489  {
3490 /* Lock the sub directory */
3491  dp->lockid = inc_lock(dp, 0);
3492  if (!dp->lockid)
3493  res = FR_TOO_MANY_OPEN_FILES;
3494  }
3495  else
3496  {
3497  dp->lockid = 0; /* Root directory need not to be locked */
3498  }
3499  }
3500 #endif
3501  }
3502  }
3503  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_NO_PATH;
3504  }
3505  if (res != FR_OK) dp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate the directory object if function faild */
3506 
3507  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
3508 }

3516 FRESULT f_closedir (
3517 DIR *dp /* Pointer to the directory object to be closed */
3518 )
3519 {
3520  FRESULT res;
3521 
3522  res = validate(dp);
3523  if (res == FR_OK)
3524  {
3525 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3526  FATFS *fs = dp->fs;
3527 #endif
3528 #if _FS_LOCK
3529  if (dp->lockid) /* Decrement sub-directory open counter */
3530  res = dec_lock(dp->lockid);
3531  if (res == FR_OK)
3532 #endif
3533  dp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate directory object */
3534 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3535  unlock_fs(fs, FR_OK); /* Unlock volume */
3536 #endif
3537  }
3538  return res;
3539 }

3541 
3542 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3543 /* Read Directory Entries in Sequence */
3544 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3545 
3546 MEMSPACE
3547 FRESULT f_readdir (
3548 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to the open directory object */
3549 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
3550 )
3551 {
3552  FRESULT res;
3553  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3554 
3555  res = validate(dp); /* Check validity of the object */
3556  if (res == FR_OK)
3557  {
3558  if (!fno)
3559  {
3560  res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind the directory object */
3561  }
3562  else
3563  {
3564  INIT_BUF(*dp);
3565  res = dir_read(dp, 0); /* Read an item */
3566  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Reached end of directory */
3567  {
3568  dp->sect = 0;
3569  res = FR_OK;
3570  }
3571  if (res == FR_OK) /* A valid entry is found */
3572  {
3573  get_fileinfo(dp, fno); /* Get the object information */
3574  res = dir_next(dp, 0); /* Increment index for next */
3575  if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
3576  {
3577  dp->sect = 0;
3578  res = FR_OK;
3579  }
3580  }
3581  FREE_BUF();
3582  }
3583  }
3584 
3585  LEAVE_FF(dp->fs, res);
3586 }
3587

3597 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
3598 )

3601  DIR dj;
3602  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3603 
3604 /* Get logical drive number */
3605  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
3606  if (res == FR_OK)
3607  {

3609  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3610  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3611  {
3612  if (dj.dir) /* Found an object */
3613  {
3614  if (fno) get_fileinfo(&dj, fno);
3615  } /* It is root directory */
3616  else
3617  {
3618  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3619  }
3620  }

3622  }
3623

3627 
3628 #if !_FS_READONLY
3629 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3630 /* Get Number of Free Clusters */
3631 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3632 
3633 MEMSPACE
3634 FRESULT f_getfree (
3635 const TCHAR* path, /* Path name of the logical drive number */
3636 DWORD* nclst, /* Pointer to a variable to return number of free clusters */
3637 FATFS** fatfs /* Pointer to return pointer to corresponding file system object */
3638 )
3639 {
3640  FRESULT res;
3641  FATFS *fs;
3642  DWORD n, clst, sect, stat;
3643  UINT i;
3644  BYTE fat, *p;
3645 
3646 /* Get logical drive number */
3647  res = find_volume(fatfs, &path, 0);
3648  fs = *fatfs;
3649  if (res == FR_OK)
3650  {
3651 /* If free_clust is valid, return it without full cluster scan */
3652  if (fs->free_clust <= fs->n_fatent - 2)
3653  {
3654  *nclst = fs->free_clust;
3655  }
3656  else
3657  {
3658 /* Get number of free clusters */
3659  fat = fs->fs_type;
3660  n = 0;
3661  if (fat == FS_FAT12)
3662  {
3663  clst = 2;
3664  do
3665  {
3666  stat = get_fat(fs, clst);
3667  if (stat == 0xFFFFFFFF) { res = FR_DISK_ERR; break; }
3668  if (stat == 1) { res = FR_INT_ERR; break; }
3669  if (stat == 0) n++;
3670 wdt_reset();
3671  } while (++clst < fs->n_fatent);
3672  }
3673  else
3674  {
3675  clst = fs->n_fatent;
3676  sect = fs->fatbase;
3677  i = 0; p = 0;
3678  do
3679  {
3680  if (!i)
3681  {
3682  res = move_window(fs, sect++);
3683  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3684  p = fs->win;
3685  i = SS(fs);
3686  }
3687  if (fat == FS_FAT16)
3688  {
3689  if (LD_WORD(p) == 0) n++;
3690  p += 2; i -= 2;
3691  }
3692  else
3693  {
3694  if ((LD_DWORD(p) & 0x0FFFFFFF) == 0) n++;
3695  p += 4; i -= 4;
3696  }
3697 wdt_reset();
3698  } while (--clst);
3699  }
3700  fs->free_clust = n;
3701  fs->fsi_flag |= 1;
3702  *nclst = n;
3703  }
3704  }
3705  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
3706 }
3707 
3708 
3709 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3710 /* Truncate File */
3711 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3712 
3713 MEMSPACE
3714 FRESULT f_truncate (
3715 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
3716 )
3717 {
3718  FRESULT res;
3719  DWORD ncl;
3720 
3721  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3722  if (res == FR_OK)
3723  {
3724  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
3725  {
3726  res = (FRESULT)fp->err;
3727  }
3728  else
3729  {
3730  if (!(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)) /* Check access mode */
3731  res = FR_DENIED;
3732  }
3733  }
3734  if (res == FR_OK)
3735  {
3736  if (fp->fsize > fp->fptr)
3737  {
3738  fp->fsize = fp->fptr; /* Set file size to current R/W point */
3739  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN;
3740  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* When set file size to zero, remove entire cluster chain */
3741  {
3742  res = remove_chain(fp->fs, fp->sclust);
3743  fp->sclust = 0;
3744  } /* When truncate a part of the file, remove remaining clusters */
3745  else
3746  {
3747  ncl = get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
3748  res = FR_OK;
3749  if (ncl == 0xFFFFFFFF) res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3750  if (ncl == 1) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3751  if (res == FR_OK && ncl < fp->fs->n_fatent)
3752  {
3753  res = put_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust, 0x0FFFFFFF);
3754  if (res == FR_OK) res = remove_chain(fp->fs, ncl);
3755  }
3756  }
3757 #if !_FS_TINY
3758  if (res == FR_OK && (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY))
3759  {
3760  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3761  res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3762  else
3763  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3764  }
3765 #endif
3766  }
3767  if (res != FR_OK) fp->err = (FRESULT)res;
3768  }
3769 
3770  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3771 }
3772 
3773 
3774 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3775 /* Delete a File or Directory */
3776 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3777 
3778 MEMSPACE
3779 FRESULT f_unlink (
3780 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the file or directory path */
3781 )
3782 {
3783  FRESULT res;
3784  DIR dj, sdj;
3785  BYTE *dir;
3786  DWORD dclst;
3787  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3788 
3789 /* Get logical drive number */
3790  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3791  if (res == FR_OK)
3792  {
3793  INIT_BUF(dj);
3794  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3795  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3796  res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove dot entry */
3797 #if _FS_LOCK
3798  if (res == FR_OK) res = chk_lock(&dj, 2); /* Cannot remove open file */
3799 #endif
3800  if (res == FR_OK) /* The object is accessible */
3801  {
3802  dir = dj.dir;
3803  if (!dir)
3804  {
3805  res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove the start directory */
3806  }
3807  else
3808  {
3809  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_RDO)
3810  res = FR_DENIED; /* Cannot remove R/O object */
3811  }
3812  dclst = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir);
3813 /* Is it a sub-dir? */
3814  if (res == FR_OK && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
3815  {
3816  if (dclst < 2)
3817  {
3818  res = FR_INT_ERR;
3819  }
3820  else
3821  {
3822 /* Check if the sub-directory is empty or not */
3823  mem_cpy(&sdj, &dj, sizeof (DIR));
3824  sdj.sclust = dclst;
3825  res = dir_sdi(&sdj, 2); /* Exclude dot entries */
3826  if (res == FR_OK)
3827  {
3828  res = dir_read(&sdj, 0); /* Read an item */
3829  if (res == FR_OK /* Not empty directory */
3830  #if _FS_RPATH
3831 /* Current directory */
3832  || dclst == dj.fs->cdir
3833  #endif
3834  ) res = FR_DENIED;
3835 /* Empty */
3836  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_OK;
3837  }
3838  }
3839  }
3840  if (res == FR_OK)
3841  {
3842  res = dir_remove(&dj); /* Remove the directory entry */
3843  if (res == FR_OK)
3844  {
3845  if (dclst) /* Remove the cluster chain if exist */
3846  res = remove_chain(dj.fs, dclst);
3847  if (res == FR_OK) res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3848  }
3849  }
3850  }
3851  FREE_BUF();
3852  }
3853 
3854  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3855 }
3856 
3857 
3858 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3859 /* Create a Directory */
3860 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3861 
3862 MEMSPACE
3863 FRESULT f_mkdir (
3864 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3865 )
3866 {
3867  FRESULT res;
3868  DIR dj;
3869  BYTE *dir, n;
3870  DWORD dsc, dcl, pcl, tm = get_fattime();
3871  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3872 
3873 /* Get logical drive number */
3874  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3875  if (res == FR_OK)
3876  {
3877  INIT_BUF(dj);
3878  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3879  if (res == FR_OK) res = FR_EXIST; /* Any object with same name is already existing */
3880  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_NO_FILE && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3881  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3882  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Can create a new directory */
3883  {
3884  dcl = create_chain(dj.fs, 0); /* Allocate a cluster for the new directory table */
3885  res = FR_OK;
3886  if (dcl == 0) res = FR_DENIED; /* No space to allocate a new cluster */
3887  if (dcl == 1) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3888  if (dcl == 0xFFFFFFFF) res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3889  if (res == FR_OK) /* Flush FAT */
3890  res = sync_window(dj.fs);
3891  if (res == FR_OK) /* Initialize the new directory table */
3892  {
3893  dsc = clust2sect(dj.fs, dcl);
3894  dir = dj.fs->win;
3895  mem_set(dir, 0, SS(dj.fs));
3896  mem_set(dir+DIR_Name, ' ', 11); /* Create "." entry */
3897  dir[DIR_Name] = '.';
3898  dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR;
3899  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
3900  st_clust(dir, dcl);
3901  mem_cpy(dir+SZ_DIR, dir, SZ_DIR); /* Create ".." entry */
3902  dir[SZ_DIR+1] = '.'; pcl = dj.sclust;
3903  if (dj.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 && pcl == dj.fs->dirbase)
3904  pcl = 0;
3905  st_clust(dir+SZ_DIR, pcl);
3906  for (n = dj.fs->csize; n; n--) /* Write dot entries and clear following sectors */
3907  {
3908  dj.fs->winsect = dsc++;
3909  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3910  res = sync_window(dj.fs);
3911  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3912  mem_set(dir, 0, SS(dj.fs));
3913  }
3914  }
3915 /* Register the object to the directoy */
3916  if (res == FR_OK) res = dir_register(&dj);
3917  if (res != FR_OK)
3918  {
3919  remove_chain(dj.fs, dcl); /* Could not register, remove cluster chain */
3920  }
3921  else
3922  {
3923  dir = dj.dir;
3924  dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR; /* Attribute */
3925  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm); /* Created time */
3926  st_clust(dir, dcl); /* Table start cluster */
3927  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3928  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3929  }
3930  }
3931  FREE_BUF();
3932  }
3933 
3934  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3935 }

3938 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3939 /* Change Attribute */
3940 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3941 
3942 MEMSPACE
3943 FRESULT f_chmod (
3944 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file path */
3945 BYTE value, /* Attribute bits */
3946 BYTE mask /* Attribute mask to change */
3947 )
3948 {
3949  FRESULT res;
3950  DIR dj;
3951  BYTE *dir;
3952  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3953 
3954 /* Get logical drive number */
3955  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3956  if (res == FR_OK)
3957  {
3958  INIT_BUF(dj);
3959  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3960  FREE_BUF();
3961  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3962  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3963  if (res == FR_OK)
3964  {
3965  dir = dj.dir;
3966  if (!dir) /* Is it a root directory? */
3967  {
3968  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3969  } /* File or sub directory */
3970  else
3971  {
3972 /* Valid attribute mask */
3973  mask &= AM_RDO|AM_HID|AM_SYS|AM_ARC;
3974 /* Apply attribute change */
3975  dir[DIR_Attr] = (value & mask) | (dir[DIR_Attr] & (BYTE)~mask);
3976  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3977  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3978  }
3979  }
3980  }
3981 
3982  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3983 }

4031 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4032 /* Rename File/Directory */
4033 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4034 
4035 MEMSPACE
4036 FRESULT f_rename (
4037 const TCHAR* path_old, /* Pointer to the object to be renamed */
4038 const TCHAR* path_new /* Pointer to the new name */
4039 )
4040 {
4041  FRESULT res;
4042  DIR djo, djn;
4043  BYTE buf[21], *dir;
4044  DWORD dw;
4045  DEF_NAMEBUF;
4046 
4047 /* Get logical drive number of the source object */
4048  res = find_volume(&djo.fs, &path_old, 1);
4049  if (res == FR_OK)
4050  {
4051  djn.fs = djo.fs;
4052  INIT_BUF(djo);
4053  res = follow_path(&djo, path_old); /* Check old object */
4054  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (djo.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
4055  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
4056 #if _FS_LOCK
4057  if (res == FR_OK) res = chk_lock(&djo, 2);
4058 #endif
4059  if (res == FR_OK) /* Old object is found */
4060  {
4061  if (!djo.dir) /* Is root dir? */
4062  {
4063  res = FR_NO_FILE;
4064  }
4065  else
4066  {
4067 /* Save the object information except name */
4068  mem_cpy(buf, djo.dir+DIR_Attr, 21);
4069  mem_cpy(&djn, &djo, sizeof (DIR));/* Duplicate the directory object */
4070  if (get_ldnumber(&path_new) >= 0) /* Snip drive number off and ignore it */
4071 /* and check if new object is exist */
4072  res = follow_path(&djn, path_new);
4073  else
4074  res = FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
4075  if (res == FR_OK) res = FR_EXIST; /* The new object name is already existing */
4076  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Is it a valid path and no name collision? */
4077  {
4078 /* Start critical section that any interruption can cause a cross-link */
4079  res = dir_register(&djn); /* Register the new entry */
4080  if (res == FR_OK)
4081  {
4082  dir = djn.dir; /* Copy object information except name */
4083  mem_cpy(dir+13, buf+2, 19);
4084  dir[DIR_Attr] = buf[0] | AM_ARC;
4085  djo.fs->wflag = 1;
4086 /* Update .. entry in the directory if needed */
4087  if (djo.sclust != djn.sclust && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
4088  {
4089  dw = clust2sect(djo.fs, ld_clust(djo.fs, dir));
4090  if (!dw)
4091  {
4092  res = FR_INT_ERR;
4093  }
4094  else
4095  {
4096  res = move_window(djo.fs, dw);
4097 /* .. entry */
4098  dir = djo.fs->win+SZ_DIR;
4099  if (res == FR_OK && dir[1] == '.')
4100  {
4101  dw = (djo.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 && djn.sclust == djo.fs->dirbase) ? 0 : djn.sclust;
4102  st_clust(dir, dw);
4103  djo.fs->wflag = 1;
4104  }
4105  }
4106  }
4107  if (res == FR_OK)
4108  {
4109 /* Remove old entry */
4110  res = dir_remove(&djo);
4111  if (res == FR_OK)
4112  res = sync_fs(djo.fs);
4113  }
4114  }
4115 /* End critical section */
4116  }
4117  }
4118  }
4119  FREE_BUF();
4120  }
4121 
4122  LEAVE_FF(djo.fs, res);
4123 }
4124 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
4125 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE == 0 */
4126 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE <= 1 */
4127 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2 */
4128 
4129 #if _USE_LABEL
4130 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4131 /* Get volume label */
4132 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4133 
4134 MEMSPACE
4135 FRESULT f_getlabel (
4136 const TCHAR* path, /* Path name of the logical drive number */
4137 TCHAR* label, /* Pointer to a buffer to return the volume label */
4138 DWORD* vsn /* Pointer to a variable to return the volume serial number */
4139 )
4140 {
4141  FRESULT res;
4142  DIR dj;
4143  UINT i, j;
4144 
4145 /* Get logical drive number */
4146  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
4147 
4148 /* Get volume label */
4149  if (res == FR_OK && label)
4150  {
4151  dj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
4152  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
4153  if (res == FR_OK)
4154  {
4155  res = dir_read(&dj, 1); /* Get an entry with AM_VOL */
4156  if (res == FR_OK) /* A volume label is exist */
4157  {
4158 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4159  WCHAR w;
4160  i = j = 0;
4161  do
4162  {
4163  w = (i < 11) ? dj.dir[i++] : ' ';
4164  if (IsDBCS1(w) && i < 11 && IsDBCS2(dj.dir[i]))
4165  w = w << 8 | dj.dir[i++];
4166  label[j++] = ff_convert(w, 1);/* OEM -> Unicode */
4167  } while (j < 11);
4168 #else
4169  mem_cpy(label, dj.dir, 11);
4170 #endif
4171  j = 11;
4172  do
4173  {
4174  label[j] = 0;
4175  if (!j) break;
4176  } while (label[--j] == ' ');
4177  }
4178  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* No label, return nul string */
4179  {
4180  label[0] = 0;
4181  res = FR_OK;
4182  }
4183  }
4184  }
4185 
4186 /* Get volume serial number */
4187  if (res == FR_OK && vsn)
4188  {
4189  res = move_window(dj.fs, dj.fs->volbase);
4190  if (res == FR_OK)
4191  {
4192  i = dj.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 ? BS_VolID32 : BS_VolID;
4193  *vsn = LD_DWORD(&dj.fs->win[i]);
4194  }
4195  }
4196 
4197  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4198 }
4199 
4200 
4201 #if !_FS_READONLY
4202 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4203 /* Set volume label */
4204 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4205 
4206 MEMSPACE
4207 FRESULT f_setlabel (
4208 const TCHAR* label /* Pointer to the volume label to set */
4209 )
4210 {
4211  FRESULT res;
4212  DIR dj;
4213  BYTE vn[11];
4214  UINT i, j, sl;
4215  WCHAR w;
4216  DWORD tm;
4217 
4218 /* Get logical drive number */
4219  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &label, 1);
4220  if (res) LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4221 
4222 /* Create a volume label in directory form */
4223  vn[0] = 0;
4224  for (sl = 0; label[sl]; sl++) ; /* Get name length */
4225  for ( ; sl && label[sl-1] == ' '; sl--) ; /* Remove trailing spaces */
4226  if (sl) /* Create volume label in directory form */
4227  {
4228  i = j = 0;
4229  do
4230  {
4231 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4232  w = ff_convert(ff_wtoupper(label[i++]), 0);
4233 #else
4234  w = (BYTE)label[i++];
4235  if (IsDBCS1(w))
4236  w = (j < 10 && i < sl && IsDBCS2(label[i])) ? w << 8 | (BYTE)label[i++] : 0;
4237 #if _USE_LFN
4238  w = ff_convert(ff_wtoupper(ff_convert(w, 1)), 0);
4239 #else
4240  if (IsLower(w)) w -= 0x20; /* To upper ASCII characters */
4241 #ifdef _EXCVT
4242  if (w >= 0x80) w = ExCvt[w - 0x80]; /* To upper extended characters (SBCS cfg) */
4243 #else
4244  if (!_DF1S && w >= 0x80) w = 0; /* Reject extended characters (ASCII cfg) */
4245 #endif
4246 #endif
4247 #endif
4248 /* Reject invalid characters for volume label */
4249  if (!w || chk_chr("\"*+,.:;<=>\?[]|\x7F", w) || j >= (UINT)((w >= 0x100) ? 10 : 11))
4250  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, FR_INVALID_NAME);
4251  if (w >= 0x100) vn[j++] = (BYTE)(w >> 8);
4252  vn[j++] = (BYTE)w;
4253  } while (i < sl);
4254  while (j < 11) vn[j++] = ' ';
4255  }
4256 
4257 /* Set volume label */
4258  dj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
4259  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
4260  if (res == FR_OK)
4261  {
4262  res = dir_read(&dj, 1); /* Get an entry with AM_VOL */
4263  if (res == FR_OK) /* A volume label is found */
4264  {
4265  if (vn[0])
4266  {
4267  mem_cpy(dj.dir, vn, 11); /* Change the volume label name */
4268  tm = get_fattime();
4269  ST_DWORD(dj.dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
4270  }
4271  else
4272  {
4273  dj.dir[0] = DDE; /* Remove the volume label */
4274  }
4275  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
4276  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
4277  } /* No volume label is found or error */
4278  else
4279  {
4280  if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4281  {
4282  res = FR_OK;
4283  if (vn[0]) /* Create volume label as new */
4284  {
4285  res = dir_alloc(&dj, 1); /* Allocate an entry for volume label */
4286  if (res == FR_OK)
4287  {
4288 /* Set volume label */
4289  mem_set(dj.dir, 0, SZ_DIR);
4290  mem_cpy(dj.dir, vn, 11);
4291  dj.dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_VOL;
4292  tm = get_fattime();
4293  ST_DWORD(dj.dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
4294  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
4295  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
4296  }
4297  }
4298  }
4299  }
4300  }
4301 
4302  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4303 }
4304 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
4305 #endif /* _USE_LABEL */
4306 
4307 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4308 /* Forward data to the stream directly (available on only tiny cfg) */
4309 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4310 #if _USE_FORWARD && _FS_TINY
4311 
4312 MEMSPACE
4313 FRESULT f_forward (
4314 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
4315 UINT (*func)(const BYTE*,UINT), /* Pointer to the streaming function */
4316 UINT btf, /* Number of bytes to forward */
4317 UINT* bf /* Pointer to number of bytes forwarded */
4318 )
4319 {
4320  FRESULT res;
4321  DWORD remain, clst, sect;
4322  UINT rcnt;
4323  BYTE csect;
4324 
4325  *bf = 0; /* Clear transfer byte counter */
4326 
4327  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
4328  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
4329  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
4330  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
4331  if (!(fp->flag & FA_READ)) /* Check access mode */
4332  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
4333 
4334  remain = fp->fsize - fp->fptr;
4335  if (btf > remain) btf = (UINT)remain; /* Truncate btf by remaining bytes */
4336 
4337  for ( ; btf && (*func)(0, 0); /* Repeat until all data transferred or stream becomes busy */
4338  fp->fptr += rcnt, *bf += rcnt, btf -= rcnt)
4339  {
4340 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
4341  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
4342  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
4343  {
4344  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
4345  {
4346  clst = (fp->fptr == 0) ? /* On the top of the file? */
4347  fp->sclust : get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
4348  if (clst <= 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4349  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4350  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
4351  }
4352  }
4353  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current data sector */
4354  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4355  sect += csect;
4356  if (move_window(fp->fs, sect)) /* Move sector window */
4357  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4358  fp->dsect = sect;
4359 /* Forward data from sector window */
4360  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) - (WORD)(fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
4361  if (rcnt > btf) rcnt = btf;
4362  rcnt = (*func)(&fp->fs->win[(WORD)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
4363  if (!rcnt) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4364  }
4365 
4366  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
4367 }
4368 #endif /* _USE_FORWARD */
4369 
4370 #if _USE_MKFS && !_FS_READONLY
4371 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4372 /* Create File System on the Drive */
4373 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4374 #define N_ROOTDIR 512 /* Number of root directory entries for FAT12/16 */
4375 #define N_FATS 1 /* Number of FAT copies (1 or 2) */
4376 
4377 MEMSPACE
4378 FRESULT f_mkfs (
4379 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number */
4380 BYTE sfd, /* Partitioning rule 0:FDISK, 1:SFD */
4381 UINT au /* Allocation unit [bytes] */
4382 )
4383 {
4384  static const WORD vst[] = { 1024, 512, 256, 128, 64, 32, 16, 8, 4, 2, 0};
4385  static const WORD cst[] = {32768, 16384, 8192, 4096, 2048, 16384, 8192, 4096, 2048, 1024, 512};
4386  int vol;
4387  BYTE fmt, md, sys, *tbl, pdrv, part;
4388  DWORD n_clst, vs, n, wsect;
4389  UINT i;
4390  DWORD b_vol, b_fat, b_dir, b_data; /* LBA */
4391  DWORD n_vol, n_rsv, n_fat, n_dir; /* Size */
4392  FATFS *fs;
4393  DSTATUS stat;
4394 
4395 /* Check mounted drive and clear work area */
4396  vol = get_ldnumber(&path);
4397  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
4398  if (sfd > 1) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4399  if (au & (au - 1)) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4400  fs = FatFs[vol];
4401  if (!fs) return FR_NOT_ENABLED;
4402  fs->fs_type = 0;
4403  pdrv = LD2PD(vol); /* Physical drive */
4404  part = LD2PT(vol); /* Partition (0:auto detect, 1-4:get from partition table)*/
4405 
4406 /* Get disk statics */
4407  stat = disk_initialize(pdrv);
4408  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) return FR_NOT_READY;
4409  if (stat & STA_PROTECT) return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
4410 #if _MAX_SS != _MIN_SS /* Get disk sector size */
4411  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &SS(fs)) != RES_OK || SS(fs) > _MAX_SS || SS(fs) < _MIN_SS)
4412  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4413 #endif
4414  if (_MULTI_PARTITION && part)
4415  {
4416 /* Get partition information from partition table in the MBR */
4417  if (disk_read(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) return FR_DISK_ERR;
4418  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA) != 0xAA55) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4419  tbl = &fs->win[MBR_Table + (part - 1) * SZ_PTE];
4420  if (!tbl[4]) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED; /* No partition? */
4421  b_vol = LD_DWORD(tbl+8); /* Volume start sector */
4422  n_vol = LD_DWORD(tbl+12); /* Volume size */
4423  }
4424  else
4425  {
4426 /* Create a partition in this function */
4427  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &n_vol) != RES_OK || n_vol < 128)
4428  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4429  b_vol = (sfd) ? 0 : 63; /* Volume start sector */
4430  n_vol -= b_vol; /* Volume size */
4431  }
4432 
4433  if (!au) /* AU auto selection */
4434  {
4435  vs = n_vol / (2000 / (SS(fs) / 512));
4436  for (i = 0; vs < vst[i]; i++) ;
4437  au = cst[i];
4438  }
4439  au /= SS(fs); /* Number of sectors per cluster */
4440  if (au == 0) au = 1;
4441  if (au > 128) au = 128;
4442 
4443 /* Pre-compute number of clusters and FAT sub-type */
4444  n_clst = n_vol / au;
4445  fmt = FS_FAT12;
4446  if (n_clst >= MIN_FAT16) fmt = FS_FAT16;
4447  if (n_clst >= MIN_FAT32) fmt = FS_FAT32;
4448 
4449 /* Determine offset and size of FAT structure */
4450  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4451  {
4452  n_fat = ((n_clst * 4) + 8 + SS(fs) - 1) / SS(fs);
4453  n_rsv = 32;
4454  n_dir = 0;
4455  }
4456  else
4457  {
4458  n_fat = (fmt == FS_FAT12) ? (n_clst * 3 + 1) / 2 + 3 : (n_clst * 2) + 4;
4459  n_fat = (n_fat + SS(fs) - 1) / SS(fs);
4460  n_rsv = 1;
4461  n_dir = (DWORD)N_ROOTDIR * SZ_DIR / SS(fs);
4462  }
4463  b_fat = b_vol + n_rsv; /* FAT area start sector */
4464  b_dir = b_fat + n_fat * N_FATS; /* Directory area start sector */
4465  b_data = b_dir + n_dir; /* Data area start sector */
4466 /* Too small volume */
4467  if (n_vol < b_data + au - b_vol) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4468 
4469 /* Align data start sector to erase block boundary (for flash memory media) */
4470  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_BLOCK_SIZE, &n) != RES_OK || !n || n > 32768) n = 1;
4471  n = (b_data + n - 1) & ~(n - 1); /* Next nearest erase block from current data start */
4472  n = (n - b_data) / N_FATS;
4473  if (fmt == FS_FAT32) /* FAT32: Move FAT offset */
4474  {
4475  n_rsv += n;
4476  b_fat += n;
4477  } /* FAT12/16: Expand FAT size */
4478  else
4479  {
4480  n_fat += n;
4481  }
4482 
4483 /* Determine number of clusters and final check of validity of the FAT sub-type */
4484  n_clst = (n_vol - n_rsv - n_fat * N_FATS - n_dir) / au;
4485  if ( (fmt == FS_FAT16 && n_clst < MIN_FAT16)
4486  || (fmt == FS_FAT32 && n_clst < MIN_FAT32))
4487  return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4488 
4489 /* Determine system ID in the partition table */
4490  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4491  {
4492  sys = 0x0C; /* FAT32X */
4493  }
4494  else
4495  {
4496  if (fmt == FS_FAT12 && n_vol < 0x10000)
4497  {
4498  sys = 0x01; /* FAT12(<65536) */
4499  }
4500  else
4501  {
4502  sys = (n_vol < 0x10000) ? 0x04 : 0x06;/* FAT16(<65536) : FAT12/16(>=65536) */
4503  }
4504  }
4505 
4506  if (_MULTI_PARTITION && part)
4507  {
4508 /* Update system ID in the partition table */
4509  tbl = &fs->win[MBR_Table + (part - 1) * SZ_PTE];
4510  tbl[4] = sys;
4511  if (disk_write(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) /* Write it to teh MBR */
4512  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4513  md = 0xF8;
4514  }
4515  else
4516  {
4517  if (sfd) /* No partition table (SFD) */
4518  {
4519  md = 0xF0;
4520  } /* Create partition table (FDISK) */
4521  else
4522  {
4523  mem_set(fs->win, 0, SS(fs));
4524  tbl = fs->win+MBR_Table; /* Create partition table for single partition in the drive */
4525  tbl[1] = 1; /* Partition start head */
4526  tbl[2] = 1; /* Partition start sector */
4527  tbl[3] = 0; /* Partition start cylinder */
4528  tbl[4] = sys; /* System type */
4529  tbl[5] = 254; /* Partition end head */
4530  n = (b_vol + n_vol) / 63 / 255;
4531  tbl[6] = (BYTE)(n >> 2 | 63); /* Partition end sector */
4532  tbl[7] = (BYTE)n; /* End cylinder */
4533  ST_DWORD(tbl+8, 63); /* Partition start in LBA */
4534  ST_DWORD(tbl+12, n_vol); /* Partition size in LBA */
4535  ST_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* MBR signature */
4536  if (disk_write(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) /* Write it to the MBR */
4537  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4538  md = 0xF8;
4539  }
4540  }
4541 
4542 /* Create BPB in the VBR */
4543  tbl = fs->win; /* Clear sector */
4544  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs));
4545  mem_cpy(tbl, "\xEB\xFE\x90" "MSDOS5.0", 11); /* Boot jump code, OEM name */
4546  i = SS(fs); /* Sector size */
4547  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_BytsPerSec, i);
4548  tbl[BPB_SecPerClus] = (BYTE)au; /* Sectors per cluster */
4549  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_RsvdSecCnt, n_rsv); /* Reserved sectors */
4550  tbl[BPB_NumFATs] = N_FATS; /* Number of FATs */
4551  i = (fmt == FS_FAT32) ? 0 : N_ROOTDIR; /* Number of root directory entries */
4552  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_RootEntCnt, i);
4553  if (n_vol < 0x10000) /* Number of total sectors */
4554  {
4555  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_TotSec16, n_vol);
4556  }
4557  else
4558  {
4559  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_TotSec32, n_vol);
4560  }
4561  tbl[BPB_Media] = md; /* Media descriptor */
4562  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_SecPerTrk, 63); /* Number of sectors per track */
4563  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_NumHeads, 255); /* Number of heads */
4564  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_HiddSec, b_vol); /* Hidden sectors */
4565  n = get_fattime(); /* Use current time as VSN */
4566  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4567  {
4568  ST_DWORD(tbl+BS_VolID32, n); /* VSN */
4569  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_FATSz32, n_fat); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
4570  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_RootClus, 2); /* Root directory start cluster (2) */
4571  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_FSInfo, 1); /* FSINFO record offset (VBR+1) */
4572  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_BkBootSec, 6); /* Backup boot record offset (VBR+6) */
4573  tbl[BS_DrvNum32] = 0x80; /* Drive number */
4574  tbl[BS_BootSig32] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
4575 /* Volume label, FAT signature */
4576  mem_cpy(tbl+BS_VolLab32, "NO NAME " "FAT32 ", 19);
4577  }
4578  else
4579  {
4580  ST_DWORD(tbl+BS_VolID, n); /* VSN */
4581  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_FATSz16, n_fat); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
4582  tbl[BS_DrvNum] = 0x80; /* Drive number */
4583  tbl[BS_BootSig] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
4584 /* Volume label, FAT signature */
4585  mem_cpy(tbl+BS_VolLab, "NO NAME " "FAT ", 19);
4586  }
4587  ST_WORD(tbl+BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* Signature (Offset is fixed here regardless of sector size) */
4588  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol, 1)) /* Write it to the VBR sector */
4589  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4590  if (fmt == FS_FAT32) /* Write backup VBR if needed (VBR+6) */
4591  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 6, 1);
4592 
4593 /* Initialize FAT area */
4594  wsect = b_fat;
4595  for (i = 0; i < N_FATS; i++) /* Initialize each FAT copy */
4596  {
4597  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs)); /* 1st sector of the FAT */
4598  n = md; /* Media descriptor byte */
4599  if (fmt != FS_FAT32)
4600  {
4601  n |= (fmt == FS_FAT12) ? 0x00FFFF00 : 0xFFFFFF00;
4602  ST_DWORD(tbl+0, n); /* Reserve cluster #0-1 (FAT12/16) */
4603  }
4604  else
4605  {
4606  n |= 0xFFFFFF00;
4607  ST_DWORD(tbl+0, n); /* Reserve cluster #0-1 (FAT32) */
4608  ST_DWORD(tbl+4, 0xFFFFFFFF);
4609  ST_DWORD(tbl+8, 0x0FFFFFFF); /* Reserve cluster #2 for root directory */
4610  }
4611  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4612  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4613  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs)); /* Fill following FAT entries with zero */
4614  for (n = 1; n < n_fat; n++) /* This loop may take a time on FAT32 volume due to many single sector writes */
4615  {
4616  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4617  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4618  }
4619  }
4620 
4621 /* Initialize root directory */
4622  i = (fmt == FS_FAT32) ? au : (UINT)n_dir;
4623  do
4624  {
4625  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4626  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4627 wdt_reset();
4628  } while (--i);
4629 
4630 #if _USE_ERASE /* Erase data area if needed */
4631  {
4632  DWORD eb[2];
4633 
4634  eb[0] = wsect; eb[1] = wsect + (n_clst - ((fmt == FS_FAT32) ? 1 : 0)) * au - 1;
4635  disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_ERASE_SECTOR, eb);
4636  }
4637 #endif
4638 
4639 /* Create FSINFO if needed */
4640  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4641  {
4642  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_LeadSig, 0x41615252);
4643  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_StrucSig, 0x61417272);
4644  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_Free_Count, n_clst - 1); /* Number of free clusters */
4645  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_Nxt_Free, 2); /* Last allocated cluster# */
4646  ST_WORD(tbl+BS_55AA, 0xAA55);
4647  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 1, 1); /* Write original (VBR+1) */
4648  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 7, 1); /* Write backup (VBR+7) */
4649  }
4650 
4651  return (disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_SYNC, 0) == RES_OK) ? FR_OK : FR_DISK_ERR;
4652 }
4653 
4654 
4655 #if _MULTI_PARTITION
4656 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4657 /* Divide Physical Drive */
4658 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4659 
4660 MEMSPACE
4661 FRESULT f_fdisk (
4662 BYTE pdrv, /* Physical drive number */
4663 const DWORD szt[], /* Pointer to the size table for each partitions */
4664 void* work /* Pointer to the working buffer */
4665 )
4666 {
4667  UINT i, n, sz_cyl, tot_cyl, b_cyl, e_cyl, p_cyl;
4668  BYTE s_hd, e_hd, *p, *buf = (BYTE*)work;
4669  DSTATUS stat;
4670  DWORD sz_disk, sz_part, s_part;
4671 
4672  stat = disk_initialize(pdrv);
4673  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) return FR_NOT_READY;
4674  if (stat & STA_PROTECT) return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
4675  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &sz_disk)) return FR_DISK_ERR;
4676 
4677 /* Determine CHS in the table regardless of the drive geometry */
4678  for (n = 16; n < 256 && sz_disk / n / 63 > 1024; n *= 2) ;
4679  if (n == 256) n--;
4680  e_hd = n - 1;
4681  sz_cyl = 63 * n;
4682  tot_cyl = sz_disk / sz_cyl;
4683 
4684 /* Create partition table */
4685  mem_set(buf, 0, _MAX_SS);
4686  p = buf + MBR_Table; b_cyl = 0;
4687  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++, p += SZ_PTE)
4688  {
4689  p_cyl = (szt[i] <= 100U) ? (DWORD)tot_cyl * szt[i] / 100 : szt[i] / sz_cyl;
4690  if (!p_cyl) continue;
4691  s_part = (DWORD)sz_cyl * b_cyl;
4692  sz_part = (DWORD)sz_cyl * p_cyl;
4693  if (i == 0) /* Exclude first track of cylinder 0 */
4694  {
4695  s_hd = 1;
4696  s_part += 63; sz_part -= 63;
4697  }
4698  else
4699  {
4700  s_hd = 0;
4701  }
4702  e_cyl = b_cyl + p_cyl - 1;
4703  if (e_cyl >= tot_cyl) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4704 
4705 /* Set partition table */
4706  p[1] = s_hd; /* Start head */
4707  p[2] = (BYTE)((b_cyl >> 2) + 1); /* Start sector */
4708  p[3] = (BYTE)b_cyl; /* Start cylinder */
4709  p[4] = 0x06; /* System type (temporary setting) */
4710  p[5] = e_hd; /* End head */
4711  p[6] = (BYTE)((e_cyl >> 2) + 63); /* End sector */
4712  p[7] = (BYTE)e_cyl; /* End cylinder */
4713  ST_DWORD(p + 8, s_part); /* Start sector in LBA */
4714  ST_DWORD(p + 12, sz_part); /* Partition size */
4715 
4716 /* Next partition */
4717  b_cyl += p_cyl;
4718  }
4719  ST_WORD(p, 0xAA55);
4720 
4721 /* Write it to the MBR */
4722  return (disk_write(pdrv, buf, 0, 1) || disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_SYNC, 0)) ? FR_DISK_ERR : FR_OK;
4723 }
4724 #endif /* _MULTI_PARTITION */
4725 #endif /* _USE_MKFS && !_FS_READONLY */
4726 
4727 #if _USE_STRFUNC
4728 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4729 /* Get a string from the file */
4730 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4731 
4732 MEMSPACE
4733 TCHAR* f_gets (
4734 TCHAR* buff, /* Pointer to the string buffer to read */
4735 int len, /* Size of string buffer (characters) */
4736 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4737 )
4738 {
4739  int n = 0;
4740  TCHAR c, *p = buff;
4741  BYTE s[2];
4742  UINT rc;
4743 
4744  while (n < len - 1) /* Read characters until buffer gets filled */
4745  {
4746 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4747 #if _STRF_ENCODE == 3 /* Read a character in UTF-8 */
4748  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4749  if (rc != 1) break;
4750  c = s[0];
4751  if (c >= 0x80)
4752  {
4753  if (c < 0xC0) continue; /* Skip stray trailer */
4754  if (c < 0xE0) /* Two-byte sequence */
4755  {
4756  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4757  if (rc != 1) break;
4758  c = (c & 0x1F) << 6 | (s[0] & 0x3F);
4759  if (c < 0x80) c = '?';
4760  }
4761  else
4762  {
4763  if (c < 0xF0) /* Three-byte sequence */
4764  {
4765  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4766  if (rc != 2) break;
4767  c = c << 12 | (s[0] & 0x3F) << 6 | (s[1] & 0x3F);
4768  if (c < 0x800) c = '?';
4769  } /* Reject four-byte sequence */
4770  else
4771  {
4772  c = '?';
4773  }
4774  }
4775  }
4776 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Read a character in UTF-16BE */
4777  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4778  if (rc != 2) break;
4779  c = s[1] + (s[0] << 8);
4780 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 1 /* Read a character in UTF-16LE */
4781  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4782  if (rc != 2) break;
4783  c = s[0] + (s[1] << 8);
4784 #else /* Read a character in ANSI/OEM */
4785  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4786  if (rc != 1) break;
4787  c = s[0];
4788  if (IsDBCS1(c))
4789  {
4790  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4791  if (rc != 1) break;
4792  c = (c << 8) + s[0];
4793  }
4794  c = ff_convert(c, 1); /* OEM -> Unicode */
4795  if (!c) c = '?';
4796 #endif
4797 #else /* Read a character without conversion */
4798  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4799  if (rc != 1) break;
4800  c = s[0];
4801 #endif
4802 /* Strip '\r' */
4803  if (_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && c == '\r') continue;
4804  *p++ = c;
4805  n++;
4806  if (c == '\n') break; /* Break on EOL */
4807  }
4808  *p = 0;
4809  return n ? buff : 0; /* When no data read (eof or error), return with error. */
4810 }
4811 
4812 
4813 #if !_FS_READONLY
4814 #include <stdarg.h>
4815 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4816 /* Put a character to the file */
4817 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4818 
4819 typedef struct
4820 {
4821  FIL* fp;
4822  int idx, nchr;
4823  BYTE buf[64];
4824 } putbuff;
4825 
4826 MEMSPACE
4827 static
4828 void putc_bfd (
4829 putbuff* pb,
4830 TCHAR c
4831 )
4832 {
4833  UINT bw;
4834  int i;
4835 
4836  if (_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && c == '\n') /* LF -> CRLF conversion */
4837  putc_bfd(pb, '\r');
4838 
4839  i = pb->idx; /* Buffer write index (-1:error) */
4840  if (i < 0) return;
4841 
4842 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4843 #if _STRF_ENCODE == 3 /* Write a character in UTF-8 */
4844  if (c < 0x80) /* 7-bit */
4845  {
4846  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4847  }
4848  else
4849  {
4850  if (c < 0x800) /* 11-bit */
4851  {
4852  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xC0 | c >> 6);
4853  } /* 16-bit */
4854  else
4855  {
4856  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xE0 | c >> 12);
4857  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (c >> 6 & 0x3F));
4858  }
4859  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (c & 0x3F));
4860  }
4861 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Write a character in UTF-16BE */
4862  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4863  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4864 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 1 /* Write a character in UTF-16LE */
4865  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4866  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4867 #else /* Write a character in ANSI/OEM */
4868  c = ff_convert(c, 0); /* Unicode -> OEM */
4869  if (!c) c = '?';
4870  if (c >= 0x100)
4871  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4872  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4873 #endif
4874 #else /* Write a character without conversion */
4875  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4876 #endif
4877 
4878  if (i >= (int)(sizeof pb->buf) - 3) /* Write buffered characters to the file */
4879  {
4880  f_write(pb->fp, pb->buf, (UINT)i, &bw);
4881  i = (bw == (UINT)i) ? 0 : -1;
4882  }
4883  pb->idx = i;
4884  pb->nchr++;
4885 }
4886 
4887 
4888 MEMSPACE
4889 int f_putc (
4890 TCHAR c, /* A character to be output */
4891 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4892 )
4893 {
4894  putbuff pb;
4895  UINT nw;
4896 
4897  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4898  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4899 
4900  putc_bfd(&pb, c); /* Put a character */
4901 
4902  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
4903  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
4904  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
4905  return EOF;
4906 }
4907 
4908 
4909 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4910 /* Put a string to the file */
4911 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4912 
4913 MEMSPACE
4914 int f_puts (
4915 const TCHAR* str, /* Pointer to the string to be output */
4916 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4917 )
4918 {
4919  putbuff pb;
4920  UINT nw;
4921 
4922  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4923  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4924 
4925  while (*str) /* Put the string */
4926  putc_bfd(&pb, *str++);
4927 
4928  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
4929  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
4930  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
4931  return EOF;
4932 }
4933

4935 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4936 /* Put a formatted string to the file */
4937 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4938 
4939 MEMSPACE
4940 int f_printf (
4941 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
4942 const TCHAR* fmt, /* Pointer to the format string */
4943 ... /* Optional arguments... */
4944 )
4945 {
4946  va_list arp;
4947  BYTE f, r;
4948  UINT nw, i, j, w;
4949  DWORD v;
4950  TCHAR c, d, s[16], *p;
4951  putbuff pb;
4952 
4953  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4954  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4955 
4956  va_start(arp, fmt);
4957 
4958  for (;;)
4959  {
4960  c = *fmt++;
4961  if (c == 0) break; /* End of string */
4962  if (c != '%') /* Non escape character */
4963  {
4964  putc_bfd(&pb, c);
4965  continue;
4966  }
4967  w = f = 0;
4968  c = *fmt++;
4969  if (c == '0') /* Flag: '0' padding */
4970  {
4971  f = 1; c = *fmt++;
4972  }
4973  else
4974  {
4975  if (c == '-') /* Flag: left justified */
4976  {
4977  f = 2; c = *fmt++;
4978  }
4979  }
4980  while (IsDigit(c)) /* Precision */
4981  {
4982  w = w * 10 + c - '0';
4983  c = *fmt++;
4984  }
4985  if (c == 'l' || c == 'L') /* Prefix: Size is long int */
4986  {
4987  f |= 4; c = *fmt++;
4988  }
4989  if (!c) break;
4990  d = c;
4991  if (IsLower(d)) d -= 0x20;
4992  switch (d) /* Type is... */
4993  {
4994  case 'S' : /* String */
4995  p = va_arg(arp, TCHAR*);
4996  for (j = 0; p[j]; j++) ;
4997  if (!(f & 2))
4998  {
4999  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, ' ');
5000  }
5001  while (*p) putc_bfd(&pb, *p++);
5002  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, ' ');
5003  continue;
5004  case 'C' : /* Character */
5005  putc_bfd(&pb, (TCHAR)va_arg(arp, int)); continue;
5006  case 'B' : /* Binary */
5007  r = 2; break;
5008  case 'O' : /* Octal */
5009  r = 8; break;
5010  case 'D' : /* Signed decimal */
5011  case 'U' : /* Unsigned decimal */
5012  r = 10; break;
5013  case 'X' : /* Hexdecimal */
5014  r = 16; break;
5015  default: /* Unknown type (pass-through) */
5016  putc_bfd(&pb, c); continue;
5017  }
5018 
5019 /* Get an argument and put it in numeral */
5020  v = (f & 4) ? (DWORD)va_arg(arp, long) : ((d == 'D') ? (DWORD)(long)va_arg(arp, int) : (DWORD)va_arg(arp, unsigned int));
5021  if (d == 'D' && (v & 0x80000000))
5022  {
5023  v = 0 - v;
5024  f |= 8;
5025  }
5026  i = 0;
5027  do
5028  {
5029  d = (TCHAR)(v % r); v /= r;
5030  if (d > 9) d += (c == 'x') ? 0x27 : 0x07;
5031  s[i++] = d + '0';
5032  } while (v && i < sizeof s / sizeof s[0]);
5033  if (f & 8) s[i++] = '-';
5034  j = i; d = (f & 1) ? '0' : ' ';
5035  while (!(f & 2) && j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, d);
5036  do putc_bfd(&pb, s[--i]); while (i);
5037  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, d);
5038  }
5039 
5040  va_end(arp);
5041 
5042  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
5043  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
5044  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
5045  return EOF;
5046 }
5047 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
5048 #endif /* _USE_STRFUNC */
